This layout is a basic template for a luxury 4BHK apartment. It divides the floor plate into several spaces: Living Room, Kitchen, Master Bedroom, Second Bedroom, Third Bedroom, Master Bathroom and Second Bathroom. A Staircase is also included at ground level leading to the first floor. Please adjust it according to your requirements.
